downfall:SummonMushrooms.NAME: Fungus Among Us
downfall:SummonMushrooms.DESCRIPTION: Kill all Mushrooms. Heal HP equal to their remaining HP. NL Summon two Mushrooms.

downfall:Aged.NAME: Aged
downfall:Aged.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. Ethereal. NL At the end of your turn, add a Void Status to the top of your draw pile.

downfall:Bewildered.NAME: Bewildered
downfall:Bewildered.DESCRIPTION: When you play another card, sneckomod:Muddle your hand, then discard this. NL Exhaust.

downfall:Icky.NAME: Icky
downfall:Icky.DESCRIPTION: Add a Slimed Status to your hand. NL Exhaust.

downfall:Haunted.NAME: Haunted
downfall:Haunted.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. Unplayable. NL When drawn, add Ethereal to all cards in your hand.

downfall:Malfunctioning.NAME: Flawed
downfall:Malfunctioning.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL At the end of your turn, transform all cards in hand into random Status cards. NL Exhaust.

downfall_Charboss:Beam.NAME: Beam
downfall_Charboss:Beam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain [E]. NL Exhaust this card if played from your hand.

downfall_Charboss:Barrier.NAME: Barrier
downfall_Charboss:Barrier.DESCRIPTION: If you have no Block, gain !B! Block.

downfall_Charboss:Ricochet.NAME: Ricochet
downfall_Charboss:Ricochet.DESCRIPTION: downfall:Fire 1 Ammo. Deal its effect to !M! random targets.

downfall_Charboss:HeavySlug.NAME: Heavy Slug
downfall_Charboss:HeavySlug.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Exhausts if downfall:Fired.

downfall_Charboss:FullMetalJacket.NAME: Full Metal Jacket
downfall_Charboss:FullMetalJacket.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If downfall:Fired, apply !M! Vulnerable.

downfall_Charboss:FanTheHammer.NAME: Fan The Hammer
downfall_Charboss:FanTheHammer.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL downfall:Fire Ammo cards drawn this way.

downfall_Charboss:CompressionMold.NAME: Compression Mold
downfall_Charboss:CompressionMold.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL downfall:Fired Ammo is upgraded afterwards.

downfall_Charboss:Desperado.NAME: Desperado
downfall_Charboss:Desperado.DESCRIPTION: If you no Ammo cards in your hand, deal !D! damage.
